name: modern-admin-styler-enterprise
description: Modern Admin Styler Enterprise - WordPress Admin Customization Plugin

scripts.build:css: for file in assets/css/*.css; do [ -f "$file" ] && [ "${file%.min.css}" = "$file" ] && echo "/* Minified for production v1.2.1 */" > "${file%.css}.min.css" && cat "$file" >> "${file%.css}.min.css"; done
scripts.build:js: for file in assets/js/*.js; do [ -f "$file" ] && [ "${file%.min.js}" = "$file" ] && echo "/* Minified for production v1.2.1 */" > "${file%.js}.min.js" && cat "$file" >> "${file%.js}.min.js"; done
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js

author: MASE Team
